directions: Combine tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, bagel chips, basil, red onion, olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic, basil, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl; toss until evenly combined. Refrigerate until chilled, 15 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 pound mozzarella cheese, cut into bite-size cubes
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Bruschetta Salad
